column4: my ubuntu crashes when i try to look at the screen savers..!!! help
my ubuntu crashes when i try to look at the screen savers..!!! please help
feisty fawn
Urthmover...
sorry, i thought you answered me
can't open the screen saver box, ubuntu crashes, what could be the problem?
what version are you running
feisty fawn, with gigabyte radeon 9550 256mb
so you just run system->preferences->screensaver and your systme crashes?
i just found a way to enable the fast write option from bios, so the desktop effects could start to work
but it also makes ubuntu lock
yes
ahh, well that's a whole other ball of wax. unstalbe drivers, code, etc, cause instability :)
so, should i reinstall them, if so how?
if you get instability with the desktop effects, you should probably not run them
that's okay, i will not use it
what about the screen saver?? i have an lcd screen, i need it
screensavers should work fine once you turn off the desktop effects
and i also don't like prohibitions, well at least these are just screensavers, and they should work
right, but it's the desktop special effects that are still unstable on some machines
--the desktop effects are already off, even so, screen saver window makes ubuntu crash---
again, desktop effects are off
could you tell me how to reinstall drivers?
ahh, well at that point, I dunno, srry
